name: NORTHERN PLAINS UNMANNED SYSTEMS AUTHORITY
description: Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS) development for the state of North Dakota
sampleDescriptions: Support FAA designated Northern Plains UAS Test Site, and the Broad Area COA initiative, plus FAA/COA-168's BVLOS research for MALE/HALE without a chase plane in controlled airspace, and FAA COA 123.
